stadium.name: The Old Fort
stadium.description: The team plays within the crumbling, stone-ringed ruins of an ancient hill-fort. The 'runes' are just old, weathered carvings on the standing stones that serve as obstacles.

stats.pregame_ritual: Reciting the names of legendary Trollball players of the past.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Tracing an invisible, complex sigil over their heart.
Patting every beast of burden they see on the way to the match.
Collecting a pebble from every field they've ever played on.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Spitting into their own hand and then slapping their face with it.
Reciting the names of legendary Trollball players of the past.
Braiding their hair into tight, battle-ready rows.
A toast of goat's milk to the health of their rivals.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.

stadium.name: The Serpent's Pass
stadium.location: Zmeigorod, just west of the lumber mill
stadium.description: Has to be periodically rebuilt whenever the old stadium starts sinking into the swamp. Don‚Äôt worry about it.

stats.pregame_ritual: Rubbing a foul-smelling local mushroom on their elbows for flexibility.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Polishing their helmet with a live snail for good luck.
Tensing every muscle in their body at once, then releasing.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Looking each teammate in the eye and giving a single, firm nod.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Painting a single, matching stripe of mud on each player's face.

preGame:
Hello out there in Trollball land! This is your favorite demon of the airwaves, Nok the Corrupter, coming to you live from the mossy, fog-shrouded remains of **The Old Fort** in Kerlauger! üèüÔ∏è Gee whillikers, folks, we have reached the end of the line for one of these teams! It‚Äôs Game 3 of this Best-of-3 series in the Losers Bracket, and the atmosphere is thicker than the **Dense Fog** rolling over these ancient standing stones! One team advances, and the other gets a one-way ticket back to reality‚Äîwithout any of those fancy memories of their own demise! 

The crowd today is absolutely lopsided! The **Zmeigorod Snessengers** have brought what feels like the entire swamp with them! üêç I haven't seen this many green-clad fanatics since the last time Valos the Eternal declared a mandatory day of worship! I just spotted **Evalyn Pierrepont** in the tunnel, and yes, he‚Äôs still polishing that helmet with a live snail. üêå Talk about a slow and steady preparation! Meanwhile, **Delija Dowling** is downing raw eggs like they‚Äôre going out of style. If that doesn't scream 'playoff intensity,' I don't know what does!

On the other side of the dirt, the home team **The Kerlauger Runeguard** is looking lean and mean, despite having about as many fans as I have friends in the White Ravens‚Äîwhich is to say, zero! üõ°Ô∏è They‚Äôve been through the ringer, but they‚Äôve got that home-field advantage. I saw **Lashondra Niehaus** taking her pre-game punches to the shoulder, and **Shepperd Trefler** is sporting some of the tightest braids I've ever seen. They‚Äôre ready for a brawl! The **Uneven Footing** of these **Ancient Ruins** has already claimed a few ankles in warm-ups, so keep your eyes peeled for some gruesome spills! Grab your grog and pull up a stump, because it‚Äôs do-or-die time in Osterra! üéôÔ∏è‚ú®
postGame:
Holy cow! What a defensive masterclass and a total meat-grinder of a finale we just witnessed here at The Old Fort! üõ°Ô∏è In a game where goals were harder to find than a polite word from Sir Tanos, the **Kerlauger Runeguard** have pulled off the impossible! They‚Äôve defeated the fan-favorite Zmeigorod Snessengers 1-0, taking the series 2-1 and keeping their playoff dreams alive! 

The match started in a complete stalemate as the **Dense Fog** and **Uneven Footing** made every move a gamble. **Lashondra Niehaus** managed to secure the troll head early in Center Field, but the Snessengers' defense was like a wall of muck. **Lon Gabriell** tried to break the ice with a long shot, but it sailed wide, likely disappearing into the mist. It was a scramble for possession that saw **Vivia Namara** diving into the dirt to keep the Runeguard's hopes afloat.

Then, the violence really kicked into high gear! **Kleinstein MacGregor** of the Snessengers decided to introduce **Shepperd Trefler** to the business end of a machete, sending him straight to the healer‚Äôs tent! üí• But the Runeguard didn't just sit back; they responded with a brutality that would make Lord Orzalon proud. **Gere Cordelie** absolutely leveled **Reginauld Cordell**, leaving the Runeguard's star runner seeing stars. It was a revolving door at the infirmary folks!

Just when it looked like the Snessengers might take control, **Dare Wynnie** and **Northway Orran** went on a rampage for the swamp-dwellers. They managed to injure **Benjie Foulk** and **Johnna Beetner** in rapid succession! ü©∏ The Runeguard were looking thin on the ground, but they held the line through the end of the first half. Even a wild, desperate pass from a returned Shepperd Trefler couldn't break the tie before the whistle.

Halftime saw **Eal Caundra** and **Waldon Tadeo** working overtime to stitch these warriors back together. When the second half began, the tension was high enough to snap a harp string! The Snessengers' **Alded Sanjay** tried a shot from distance, but the goal might as well have been in another reality for all the luck he had. The ball changed hands like a hot potato in a furnace!

The breakthrough finally came in a moment of pure, unadulterated teamwork. **Vivia Namara** found a rare patch of stable ground and fired a precision pass to **Lashondra Niehaus**, who was waiting in the End Zone. Lashondra didn't hesitate, dunking that leathery troll head into the goal with the force of a falling rock! ü•Ö That 1-0 lead felt like a mountain in this weather, and the Runeguard knew it!

The Snessengers tried to claw back, but the Runeguard defense turned into a buzzsaw. **Dare Wynnie** managed to take out **Harilda Sigsmond**, but it wasn't enough to stop the momentum. The Snessengers were flailing in the fog, their aggressive poses doing nothing to stop the relentless pressure of the home team. Even the 'heroic' storytelling of **Arni Griffith** couldn't save them this time‚Äîno fairy tale endings in the Losers Bracket!

In the closing minutes, the desperation was palpable. **Delija Dowling** delivered one last brutal tackle on **Shepperd Trefler**, sending him back to the healers for a second time, but the clock was the Snessengers' real enemy. The Runeguard played keep-away among the ruins, navigating the stones with a grim determination that silenced the green-clad masses in the stands.

You have to laugh at the 'heroes' of The Grove today. They came in with all the popularity in the realm, but they're leaving with nothing but bruises and a long walk home! üê∏ Perhaps if **Dame Terra Monteforte** had spent less time with her dirt magic and more time teaching the Snessengers how to find the goal, we'd be looking at a different result. But as it stands, the Runeguard have proven that grit beats glamour every time!

Final score: **The Kerlauger Runeguard 1, The Zmeigorod Snessengers 0**. The Runeguard advance, and the Snessengers are headed to the off-season to think about their life choices! üõ°Ô∏è What a series, what a game, and what a glorious amount of medical bills! I've been your host, Nok the Corrupter, and I'll see you at the next bloodbath!

Make sure to swing by the tavern and toast to the victors‚Äîjust watch out for **Imra** if you haven't paid your tab! Stay wicked, Osterra! üéôÔ∏èüíÄ
